title: The Trump Lawyer Scandal Is About Something Much Deeper Than Legal Technicalities
description: The saga is emblematic of Trump’s most dangerous and self-serving tendencies.
content: Like many other components of our constitutional system meant to restrain an overreaching executive, the Senate power of “advice and consent” on the president’s nominees is in a state of disrepair. E… [+11459 chars]
